mapper.select: SELECT todayData.*,monthData.*,lastYearDayData.*,lastYearMonthData.* FROM (SELECT count(fire_seq) as todayFireCount, nvl(sum(dead),0) as todayDead, nvl(sum(injured),0) as todayInjured, nvl(sum(amount),0) as todayAmount FROM fire_data WHERE TRUNC(reg_dt) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) )todayData, (SELECT count(fire_seq) as monthFireCount, nvl(sum(dead),0) as monthDead, nvl(sum(injured),0) as monthInjured, nvl(sum(amount),0) as monthAmount FROM fire_data WHERE TO_CHAR(reg_dt,'YYYYMM') = #{regDt} )monthData, (SELECT count(fire_seq) as lastYearDayFireCount, nvl(sum(dead),0) as lastYearDayDead, nvl(sum(injured),0) as lastYearDayInjured, nvl(sum(amount),0) as lastYearDayAmount FROM fire_data WHERE TRUNC(reg_dt) = TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-12)) )lastYearDayData, (SELECT count(fire_seq) as lastYearMonthFireCount, nvl(sum(dead),0) as lastYearMonthDead, nvl(sum(injured),0) as lastYearMonthInjured, nvl(sum(amount),0) as lastYearMonthAmount FROM fire_data WHERE TO_CHAR(reg_dt,'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{regDt},'YYYYMM'),-12), 'YYYYMM') )lastYearMonthData

SELECT big_list, monthFireCount,round(monthFireCount/12)AS monthAvg FROM ( WITH RankedData AS ( SELECT c.big_list, COUNT(*) AS monthFireCount, DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC) AS rnk FROM fire_data f JOIN code c ON f.sub_loc = c.sub_code WHERE c.master_code = 'location' AND TO_CHAR(f.reg_dt,'YYYYMM') = #{regDt} GROUP BY c.big_list ) SELECT big_list, monthFireCount FROM RankedData WHERE rnk <=3 ORDER BY rnk )

SELECT mid_list, monthFireCount,round(monthFireCount/12)AS monthAvg FROM ( WITH RankedData AS ( SELECT c.mid_list, COUNT(*) AS monthFireCount, DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC) AS rnk FROM fire_data f JOIN code c ON f.sub_loc = c.sub_code WHERE c.master_code = 'location' AND TO_CHAR(f.reg_dt,'YYYYMM') = #{regDt} GROUP BY c.mid_list ) SELECT mid_list, monthFireCount FROM RankedData WHERE rnk <=3 ORDER BY rnk )

SELECT mid_list, monthFireCount,round(monthFireCount/12)AS monthAvg FROM ( WITH RankedData AS ( SELECT c.mid_list, COUNT(*) AS monthFireCount, DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC) AS rnk FROM fire_data f JOIN code c ON f.sub_factor = c.sub_code WHERE c.master_code = 'factor' AND TO_CHAR(f.reg_dt,'YYYYMM') = #{regDt} GROUP BY c.mid_list ) SELECT mid_list, monthFireCount FROM RankedData WHERE rnk <=3 ORDER BY rnk )
